competitors.name: Pbody's - Restaurant, Food Trucks, and Event Center

reviews.text: Ever since I moved here in 2020 I have tried several different pizza restaurants and haven't found any that had a wow factor until I got a supreme pizza from Chris's pizza village. It was loaded with toppings and very tasteful. I ate three pieces  and was fulI. I will be ordering from this restaurant again. My pizza was ready in 9 minutes. Thank you
This place rocks!! It was very good pizza, and holy cow- the pizza is huge and so many toppings. I loved my veggie pizza!

The pizza was quite good, I enjoyed the quality of toppings although the placement was a bit sporadic and not very uniformed. A few critiques, we ordered thin crust and it was quite thin, but it wasn‚Äôt as crispy as I‚Äôm accustomed to when I order thin crust pizza causing these slices to be quite floppy. Also, the toppings not being very uniformed and sporadic caused some slices to have more and other slices to be lacking all together. We ordered basil on the pizza and it was very obvious it wasn‚Äôt cooked into the pizza itself. It was just thrown on top and then put in an oven where the basil chard and the stems were thrown on too. We did get a coupon code for signing up for text messages, which was quite nice because the pizza being at full price for some of the issues that we had would‚Äôve been upsetting. Overall, the quality and taste of the pizza was pretty good, but the assembly and cook was a bit sloppy and had we paid full price. I might have left a lower score.

BEST PIZZA!  We have tried quite a few pizza places here in Clarksville, this is hands down the best! The pizza was cooked perfectly. Wings were also very delicious. It was worth the drive from Fort Campbell to here. Definitely coming here again. Thank you for your great customer service also.

Reliably unreliable. Pizza quality has steadily gone down over the last few years. They routinely don't honor their own promotions (Bogo 50%), delivery is constantly late, and leave items out on the regular. Keep giving them a chance because they are the only game in our part of town. If you have another option, I'd go that way.

issues: Mobile performance data unavailable - API configuration required
recommendations: Configure Google PageSpeed Insights API for mobile analysis
Test website on mobile devices manually

detailedReviews.text:
Ordering was easy and I had a discount code. This isn‚Äôt $6 pizza but it doesn‚Äôt taste like $6 pizza either. Loaded with toppings and hot and fresh! Don‚Äôt miss the chef salad. It‚Äôs a family favorite.

Delivery can be slow especially on busy weekends, but they are up front about your wait time and it was accurate.

One of the best pizzas in Clarksville!

detailedReviews.author: Kenny Mullins

detailedReviews.author: jean casey
detailedReviews.text: Pizza delivery is great ‚Äîalways have the nicest people!  The pizza is delicious üòã.

detailedReviews.author: Josh Rohrs
detailedReviews.text: Chris' Village Pizza is our favorite pizza place in Pleasant View. Great pizza!

detailedReviews.author: C K
detailedReviews.text: Consistent quality food!  The rewards are a bonus!

detailedReviews.author: David St. Romain
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pizza. Love the cheese steak and quick delivery.

detailedReviews.author: Peter Reyman
detailedReviews.text:
Terrible service. Dinner ordered at 5:02pm at 6:30pm when I called to find out where it was at I was informed there was one delivery driver and nine orders ahead of mine. Perhaps inform your customer of this or maybe call them to give a choice? I drove to the store to pick up the pizza and asked for refund of the delivery fee. I was informed I would have to wait for a manager. After having already waiting for over ninety minutes, I chose to leave and feed my family rather than be further inconvenienced.

It being peak time on a Sunday is a poor and unacceptable excuse. Many other local
Businesses have figured out how to use Door Dash or Uber Eats to service their customers. Maybe evolve with the times? Using the same business model you've been using since you opened the location in Sango is antiquated. I've been a customer for a long time and have experienced this restaurant's steady decline firsthand.

Food is significantly overpriced, but uses fresh ingredients and tastes good. Pizza would have likely been better if it weren't lukewarm. Wings were the highlight. They were hot and good.

Luigi's, Michael's and Camacho's are quality local alternatives. Avoid Chris's unless you plan to have it made and pick it up---and even then it won't be ready at the time they tell you regardless of the day and time. It will be about 10-15 minutes past on average.

detailedReviews.author: walter huff
detailedReviews.text: Good pizza and fast

AWESOME FOOD!  I wouldn‚Äôt have expected such good pizza from a small place in a strip mall. We tried it on a whim abuot 3 months ago, and it‚Äôs now our go to Friday night pizza.
Try the chicken bacon ranch‚Ä¶.Chef's Kiss!

detailedReviews.author: M R
detailedReviews.text: My pizza was great and ready on time!

detailedReviews.author: Laura Knight
detailedReviews.text: We have tried literally every single pizza place in Clarksville/Hopkinsville. We just moved out to Sango (from on post) and were about to order the meh-okay usual in Sango that we usually ordered from when Chris‚Äôs popped up as a suggestion. Holy moly! It is wonderful! We will be ordering regularly, our kids think pizza is the best thing since sliced bread (they would say better than). And the ranch is HEAVENLY!

detailedReviews.author: Blaine Dixon
detailedReviews.text: Great birthday pizza for my son. Same great pie as always. Thanks Chris Pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Christina Mickle
detailedReviews.text: We absolutely love Chris‚Äôs pizza. Great food and wonderful staff! I've had nearly everything on their menu and just love it all!! They are prompt with delivery and my son loves extra sausage and they don‚Äôt disappoint. Thanks for being a great place over all these years!

detailedReviews.author: Sharonda Carrethers
detailedReviews.text: This was my first time ordering from Chris Pizza and let me tell you this is probably the best pizza I've ever had!! Bye Bye to Domino's and Papa Johns! From now on this is my spot and I'll make sure to order the apple pie and cinnamon twist next time.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Parreco
detailedReviews.text: Ordered two pizzas, keto bowl, cheese bread and the apple turn overs for desert. The food and service were amazing. I will be eating here again.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Martin
detailedReviews.text: Chris‚Äô Pizza is always great!!! Fresh, hot and plenty of toppings on their pizza!!

detailedReviews.author: Air Warrior
detailedReviews.text: Food is always great and delivered fast. Love this place.

detailedReviews.author: Christine Westmoreland
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town! And the employees are always happy and kind.

detailedReviews.author: Joseph Menna
detailedReviews.text: I have known Chris and his crew for decades. Besides being one of the best people I know he has maintained his high level of customer service and exceptional quality in his menu! Though I live out of state I always ensure I get the chance to stop in and eat my all time favorite sub, the classic sub. I add my little twist on it (no mayo an add jalapenos), and am always satisfied! Shout out to Jackson who made my food Great sandwich bud...as always! Overall always great food across his menu! Give them a try. You won't be disappointed!

detailedReviews.author: Robin S
detailedReviews.text: Tried the beer cheese base for our pizza today instead of the traditional pizza sauce. Excellent choice üòÅ

If something happens to not be quite what ordered, they WILL make it right!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Kimberly Koerselman
detailedReviews.text: Our first time ordering and could not have been more impressed. Best pizza we have had in months. So glad we saw the sign and called. Delivery drive was on time and was very likable. Definitely we be ordering again soon.

detailedReviews.author: Steven Willis
detailedReviews.text:
Best chicken wings I‚Äôve had since moving to Clarksville 2 years ago. Moist and delicious.
Also ordered a calzone which was excellent.
Quick, efficient and friendly customer service. I now have a ‚Äúto go‚Äù place for chicken wings. Exceeded my expectations.

detailedReviews.text: I can't speak to the restaurant atmosphere because I always get delivery or take-out. But their pizza and cheesesteaks are top-notch. The meat and cheese taste better than other pizza places. 2024 Best Pizza in Clarksville.

detailedReviews.author: Sallie Allen
detailedReviews.text: Always the best pizza.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.7/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the fast service, with pizzas ready in as little as 9 minutes, making it a convenient choice for quick meals. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The supreme pizza is praised for being loaded with toppings and having a "wow factor," setting it apart from other local options. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The pizza is consistently described as hot, fresh, and delicious, making it a go-to choice for many customers. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times and delivery issues - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and reputation issues - review management can address this concern
Competition and discovery issues - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
